effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
Attacks with muddy water.
May lower accuracy.

Attacks with muddy water.
May lower accuracy.

The user attacks
with muddy water.
It may also lower
the foe’s accuracy.

The user attacks by
shooting out muddy
water.
It may also lower the
foe’s accuracy.

The user attacks by
shooting out muddy
water.
It may also lower the
foe’s accuracy.

The user attacks by
shooting out muddy
water.
It may also lower the
foe’s accuracy.

Le lanceur attaque en projetant de l’eau
boueuse. Peut aussi réduire la Précision
de l’ennemi.

The user attacks by shooting muddy water
at the opposing team.
It may also lower the targets’ accuracy.

The user attacks by shooting muddy water
at the opposing team.
It may also lower the targets’ accuracy.

にごった　みずを
あいてに　はっしゃして　こうげきする。
めいちゅうりつを　さげることが　ある。

탁해진 물을
상대에게 발사하여 공격한다.
명중률을 떨어뜨릴 때가 있다.

Le lanceur attaque en projetant de l’eau boueuse.
Peut aussi réduire la Précision de l’ennemi.

Greift mit Matsch an und senkt eventuell
die Genauigkeit des Zieles.

Ataque con agua lodosa que puede bajar la
Precisión del equipo rival.

Chi la usa attacca i nemici che ha intorno con un
getto di fango che può anche ridurne la precisione.

The user attacks by shooting muddy water
at the opposing Pokémon.
This may also lower their accuracy.

濁った　水を
相手に　発射して　攻撃する。
命中率を　さげることが　ある。

にごった　 ずを
あいてに　はっしゃして　こうげきする。
めいちゅうりつを　さげることが　ある。

명중률을 떨어뜨릴 때가 있다.

用渾濁的污水攻擊對手。
有時會降低對手的命中率。

The user attacks by shooting muddy water at the
opposing Pokémon. This may also lower
their accuracy.

濁った　水を
相手に　発射して　攻撃する。
命中率を　さげることが　ある。

向对手喷射
浑浊的水进行攻击。
有时会降低对手的命中率。
